text: mariyu varu (ni samaksanlo): "Memu vidheyulamayyamu." Ani palukutaru. Kani ni vadda nundi velli poyina taruvata varilo kondaru ratrivelalo nivu ceppina daniki virud'dhanga sampradimpulu jaruputaru. Mariyu vari rahasya sampradimpulanni allah vrastunnadu. Kanuka nivu vari nundi mukhamu trippuko mariyu allah pai adharapadi undu. Mariyu karyasadhakudiga allah calu
